# Usernames

Contact links@openprofile.is-cool.dev with the title "Custom username in OpenProfile+". In the email, include:

* The username you want
* Your base62-encoded user ID
* Your OpenProfile+ ID

An example is:

> subject: Custom username in OpenProfile+
>
>
>
> Hello. I want to get a custom username.
>
> Here is my info:
>
> * Custom username: https://opr.ix.tc/example
> * Base62 encoded user ID: 
> * OpenProfile+ ID: XXX-XXX-XXX
>
> have a good day!

After you've emailed the team, expect a reply within 48 hours or less.
